meanings: 실용회화-엘리베이터 이용 The elevator is being repaired.
(서류를 받아서 처리함) accept, receive, take up

examples.korean: We’re having our car repaired. 발음듣기 우리 차는 수리 중이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’re having our car repaired. 발음

examples.korean: The planes in the hangar are being repaired. 발음듣기 격납고의 비행기들은 수리중에 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: The planes in the hangar are being repaired. 발음

examples.korean: No, the basement is being renovated. 발음듣기 아니오, 지하실은 수리 중입니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: No, the basement is being renovated. 발음

examples.korean: No, the machines are still being repaired. 발음듣기 아뇨, 아직도 기계들을 수리 중입니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: No, the machines are still being repaired. 발음

examples.korean: We are currently repairing the inside[interior] (of the building). 발음듣기 지금은 내부 수리 중입니다 Neungyule
examples.english: We are currently repairing the inside[interior] (of the building). 발음
